capability.name: Hedge Fund Administration
capability.definition: The Hedge Fund Administration Service Domain handles all aspects of the set-up and operation of a hedge fund that is offered to accredited investors within the bank's customer base
capability.role: Hedge funds group accredited investors as limited partners to the fund with the fund manager as the general partner. As investors are restricted to being accredited a hedge funds is free to make more aggressive investment decisions and can generate higher returns. Fund income combines management and performance fees
capability.example: A bank operates a hedge fund to support its accredited investment customers. The fund targets a market segment of specific interest to its investor membership

key_features.name: Handle the fund's accounting, tax administration and financial reporting needs
key_features.description: Enables handle the fund's accounting, tax administration and financial reporting needs to support the hedge fund administration service domain handles all aspects of the set-up and operation of a hedge fund that is offered to accredited investors within the bank's customer base

key_features.name: Manage/develop the fund, investing in alignment with fund policy
key_features.description: Enables manage/develop the fund, investing in alignment with fund policy to support the hedge fund administration service domain handles all aspects of the set-up and operation of a hedge fund that is offered to accredited investors within the bank's customer base

key_features.name: Handle investor inflows and outflow processing to the fund
key_features.description: Enables handle investor inflows and outflow processing to the fund to support the hedge fund administration service domain handles all aspects of the set-up and operation of a hedge fund that is offered to accredited investors within the bank's customer base

key_features.name: Process management and performance fees
key_features.description: Enables process management and performance fees to support the hedge fund administration service domain handles all aspects of the set-up and operation of a hedge fund that is offered to accredited investors within the bank's customer base

key_features.name: Support/oversee all general investor servicing and process middle and back office functions
key_features.description: Enables support/oversee all general investor servicing and process middle and back office functions to support the hedge fund administration service domain handles all aspects of the set-up and operation of a hedge fund that is offered to accredited investors within the bank's customer base
